meanings.definition: The deliberate prevention of conception or impregnation.
meanings.sent1: She discussed different contraceptions with her doctor to choose the best one for her.
meanings.sent2: Many couples use contraceptions to plan when they want to have children.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit about a mix-up with contraceptions at the pharmacy had the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the magical potion acted as a powerful contraception, preventing any pregnancies.
meanings.sent5: The billboard emphasized the importance of contraceptions in family planning.

meanings.definition: Methods or devices used to prevent pregnancy.
meanings.sent1: The health center provides free contraceptions to those in need.
meanings.sent2: It is essential for sexually active individuals to be informed about different contraceptions available.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine in the restroom surprisingly offered contraceptions along with snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her purse always had a variety of contraceptions just in case she needed them.
meanings.sent5: The school nurse educated the students on the importance of using contraceptions responsibly.
